thread.title: Carberry preparing to host H.S. hockey tourney
thread.title_full: Carberry preparing to host H.S. hockey tourney

title: Carberry preparing to host H.S. hockey tourney
text:
Carberry preparing to host H.S. hockey tourney By: Uncredited 
Carberry will host the Glenboro-Carberry-Baldur Wildcats pre-season high school hockey tournament this week. 
Normally staged in Glenboro, a malfunctioning ice plant there prompted the event to be moved to Carberry. 
The tournament will feature the host Wildcats and eight other teams, including the Killarney-Wawanesa Raiders, Dauphin Clippers, Boissevain Broncos, Neepawa Tigers, Minnedosa Chancellors and Mountain Mustangs. 
The event begins Thursday at 4 p.m., and wraps up with the final on Saturday at 7 p.m.
